summary: Activity retry options are not exposed through the activity Info interface in TypeScript SDK, unlike in the Java SDK. This feature request asks to add this capability.
userImpact: Users cannot access activity retry options at runtime through the Info interface, limiting observability and runtime configuration checks.
proposedFix: Expose retry options in the activity Info interface similar to the Java SDK implementation
resolutionDetails: Issue was marked as duplicate of #1210
keyQuote: Feature request is to add this ability like its possible to do for example in Java sdk.
